BluetoothConnectionConfiguration

class BluetoothConnectionConfiguration(locationId: String) : ConnectionConfiguration
Content copied to clipboard

The BluetoothConnectionConfiguration object should be used to connect to a bluetooth reader (currently DeviceType.CHIPPER_2X, DeviceType.STRIPE_M2 and DeviceType.WISEPAD_3)
